name: Yunita Widiastuti
greetingText: I'm so lucky to meet the most beautiful you in the best years of my life.
wishText: May your beauty remain, like flowers in your hair, year after year. May your youth never fade, and may happiness follow you always.
textInChatBox: Wishing you a very, very, very sincere Happy Birthday!!! So much happiness...
text2: I want to give you a surprise
text3: I have thought about it for a long time
text4: And I realized, I want to do something
text5Content: You are very special to me
outroText: I hope you like this little surprise!
replayText: If you liked it, you can watch it again! Or...
